item.title: Version 1.2.6
item.description:
Retext 1.2.6

What's New

AI Generation — Now Pro-Only

  • Retext Cloud Enabled — AI snippet generation is now powered exclusively by Retext Cloud
  • Pro Feature — AI generation requires a Pro license for unlimited use
  • No API Key Needed — Pro users get seamless AI generation without managing API keys
  • Upgrade Prompts — Free users see a clear upgrade path to unlock AI features

    • Automatic Update Notifications

  • Never Miss an Update — Retext now checks for updates automatically when you launch the app
  • Instant Prompts — If a new version is available, you'll see the update dialog within seconds of launching
  • Background Checks — Continues checking every 4 hours while the app is running
    • ---

    Previous Releases

    Tag-Based Organization

  • New Three-Panel Layout - Tags sidebar, snippet list, and detail view
  • Add Tags to Snippets - Organize your snippets with custom tags
  • Filter by Tag - Click a tag in the left sidebar to filter snippets
  • Tag Chips - See tags at a glance on snippet rows
  • "All Snippets" View - Click "All Snippets" to see everything
    • ---

    Previous Release

    Redesigned Interface

  • New NavigationSplitView Layout - Modern two-column design with native sidebar behavior
  • Improved Add Snippet - Always-visible "New Snippet" button at the bottom of the sidebar with tinted style
  • Cleaner Toolbar - License badge and settings buttons on the right, removed logo for more space

    • Visual Improvements

  • Softer, easier-on-the-eyes color palette throughout
  • Tinted button style for New Snippet (accent text on subtle accent background)
  • Hover effects on sidebar items and buttons for better interactivity
  • Consistent styling with rounded corners throughout
  • Better visual hierarchy with muted placeholder states
  • Keyboard shortcuts: ⌘E to edit, ⌘↩ to save, Esc to cancel

    • Bug Fixes

  • Fixed snippet selection not working when clicking a different snippet while editing
  • Fixed New Snippet button requiring double-click when a snippet was selected
  • Fixed process name showing blank in Activity Monitor
  • Fixed modal windows briefly reappearing when closing
  • Improved state management for sheets and dialogs

    • Snippet Validation

  • Infinite Loop Prevention - Snippets that would trigger themselves are now blocked
  • Empty Content Detection - Prevents saving snippets with empty titles or content
  • Title Length Limits - Keeps snippet titles manageable (max 40 characters)
  • Better error messages when snippet validation fails
  • Warnings for titles containing spaces
